criteria: Demonstrates comprehension of literary nonfiction texts appropriate for grades 9-10.
Ability to independently read and comprehend literary nonfiction at the high end of the grades 9-10 text complexity band (applicable primarily to 10th grade).
Demonstrates ability to make inferences and draw conclusions from the text.
descriptions: Does not demonstrate comprehension of the text; struggles significantly with basic understanding.
Demonstrates minimal comprehension; requires significant scaffolding and support to understand the text.
Demonstrates partial comprehension; requires some scaffolding and support to understand the text.
Demonstrates adequate comprehension with occasional need for clarification or support.
Demonstrates thorough comprehension of the text with minimal need for support.
Demonstrates comprehensive and insightful understanding of the text, including nuances and subtleties, independently.
Unable to read and comprehend complex texts independently.
Requires constant support and scaffolding to attempt reading complex texts.
Attempts to read complex texts but struggles significantly with comprehension even with support.
Can read complex texts with some assistance and occasional reliance on scaffolding.
Reads and comprehends complex texts with minimal assistance, demonstrating increasing independence.
Independently and proficiently reads and comprehends literary nonfiction at the high end of the grades 9-10 text complexity band.
Unable to make inferences or draw conclusions based on the text.
Struggles to make inferences even with explicit guidance.
Makes simple inferences with prompting but struggles with more complex conclusions.
Makes reasonable inferences and draws logical conclusions with occasional support.
Confidently makes inferences and draws well-supported conclusions from the text.
Insightfully makes complex inferences and draws nuanced conclusions based on a thorough understanding of the text.
